sentences.en: Air travel will continue to grow at about 6% per year.
sentences.cn: 乘飞机旅行的人数将以每年大约6%的速度持续增加。

sentences.en: As discounts kicked in, bookings for immediate travel rose by 15%.
sentences.cn: 由于开始实行打折，近期旅行的预订量上升了15%。

sentences.en: Cheap flights are available from budget travel agent from £240.
sentences.cn: 收费低廉的旅行社可以提供240英镑起的低价机票。

sentences.en: He has had to travel the country in search of work.
sentences.cn: 他不得不走遍全国寻找工作。

sentences.en: He is unable to travel much because of old age.
sentences.cn: 他年事已高，不能频繁出游。

sentences.en: He was too sick to travel to his son's side.
sentences.cn: 他病得厉害，不能赶到他儿子身边了。

sentences.en: Light travels faster than sound.
sentences.cn: 光比声音传播得快。

sentences.en: Mark, however, needs to travel extensively with his varied business interests.
sentences.cn: 然而，马克因为各种生意需要频繁出差。

sentences.en: Mr Abel's doctor has said he is unfit to travel.
sentences.cn: 埃布尔先生的医生说他不宜出行。

sentences.en: News travels fast.
sentences.cn: 消息传起来很快。

sentences.en: She bought a travel-bag large enough to contain the film canisters.
sentences.cn: 她买了一只能装得下那些胶卷筒的旅行包。

sentences.en: Skiing weekends cost £58 (exclusive of travel and accommodation).
sentences.cn: 周末滑雪价格为58英镑（不含交通和住宿费）。

sentences.en: Students often travel hundreds of miles to get here.
sentences.cn: 学生常常赶数百英里的路来到这里。

sentences.en: Students travel the cheap lower deck and tourists the upper.
sentences.cn: 学生坐廉价的下层舱，游客坐上层舱。

sentences.en: The drop in travel is bad news for the airline industry.
sentences.cn: 旅游热降温对航空业来说是个坏消息。

sentences.en: The new job involves a fair amount of travel.
sentences.cn: 新工作需要经常出差。

sentences.en: The trip gave me itchy feet and I wanted to travel more.
sentences.cn: 这次旅行让我渴望出游，想去更多的地方。

sentences.en: They travelled 200 miles on the first day.
sentences.cn: 他们第一天行进了200英里。

sentences.en: They were rarely seen together and certainly did not travel together.
sentences.cn: 很少见到他们在一起，当然更不可能一起旅行。

sentences.en: We travelled by train across Eastern Europe.
sentences.cn: 我们乘火车穿越东欧。

words.tran_cn: 富有旅行经验的；旅客多的；旅客使用的
有过…旅行的，去过…地方的
旅行的；移动的；旅行用的
旅行（等于traveled，travel的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: n. 航空旅行；空中旅行
旅行社；旅行代理人，旅行代办人
环游世界；周游世界；环球旅行
[运输工程]交通需求；旅游需求；旅运需求

trans.tran_en: to be passed quickly from one person or place to another
to go a particular distance or at a particular speed
to go a particular distance or at a particular speed

trans.tran_cn: 旅行； 行进； 被传送， 被传播； 走过， 驶过
trans.tran_en: to move at a particular speed or in a particular direction

trans.tran_cn: 旅行，传送，前进，行进，[篮球]走步
